subject: Order #SSN2833
description_text: Order #SSN2833 What is the status of the replacement for my products that were lost in shipping? It is 2 Momo quick releases and the carrier is not communicating and has not delivered the materials. I was offered a replacement and I want it sent express mail, it's been almost a month and I have another long wait to get this.

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 7248 中
